item.title: Roblox: Car Race Clicker Codes (August 2024)
item.description:
Car Race Clicker is an exciting and entertaining game that combines the genres of clicker and racing, which makes it unique among other Roblox experiences. Here, you play the car, and you have to constantly improve to participate in races and earn currency for further development, purchase of new vehicles, and upgrades.

Redeeming Car Race Clicker codes will greatly help your development from the very beginning, as you will receive generous rewards that will come in handy. Rewards from the codes will include various kinds of booster potions that will increase your efficiency, so you will achieve the desired goal faster.

Updated August 5, 2024, by Artur Novichenko: Redeeming the codes below will give you +50K to your speed and many potions, which will help you progress faster. Check back later for more freebies.

All Car Race Clicker Codes

Working Car Race Clicker Codes

  • ThanksGiving - Redeem this code to get Double Win Potion.
  • ZoomZoom - Redeem this code to get Double Acceleration Potion.
  • ClickClick - Redeem this code to get Double Click Potion.
  • Crystal - Redeem this code to get Crystal Egg.
  • 3MVisits - Redeem this code to get Double Win Potion.
  • Christmas - Redeem this code to get 3 Christmas Tickets.
  • Candy - Redeem this code to get 200 Candy.

Expired Car Race Clicker Codes

  • CrystalRedeem
  • ChristmasRedeem
  • CandyRedeem
  • 3MVisitsRedeem

Whether you're an experienced player or a beginner, redeeming Car Race Clicker will be equally beneficial to your progress. So, if you want to buy new upgrades or a car as soon as possible, be sure to take advantage of this opportunity.

How to Redeem Codes in Car Race Clicker

Since Car Race Clicker 's redemption system is quite similar to other Roblox games, experienced players shouldn't have any problems with getting rewards. However, if you are a beginner and have not redeemed codes before or have some difficulty doing so, follow these steps:

  • Launch Car Race Clicker .
  • Pay attention to the left side of the screen. There will be nine buttons arranged in three rows. Among them, interact with the first one in the second row, which says Codes.
  • This will open the redemption menu. There will be an input field and a green Redeem button below it. Now, enter manually, or better yet, copy and paste one of the above-mentioned active codes into the input field.
  • Lastly, click on the green Redeem button to submit your reward request.

If everything is done correctly, you will see a notification below the redemption menu with a list of rewards received.

How to Get More Car Race Clicker Codes

In addition to this page, you can also find Roblox codes by visiting the game's official social media. There are several pages where they can appear:

  • Official Car Race Clicker Roblox group.
  • Official Car Race Clicker Discord server.
  • Official Car Race Clicker X account.

item.title: Roblox: Roller Race Simulator Codes (August 2024)
item.description:
Rollerblading is fun even in Roblox, and this is why the developers of Roller Race Simulator have created a game where fans will have to compete with other players. To gain additional speed and other rewards, Roblox players can redeem the Roller Race Simulator codes listed below.

Updated August 5, 2024, by Artur Novichenko: We've double-checked all Roller Race Simulator codes in this article for you to have all working codes collected in one place. Redeem them for in-game benefits that will help to enhance your experience.

All Roller Race Simulator Codes

Active Roller Race Simulator Codes

  • SEASON3 - Enter this code to get Speed, and Wins Boost.
  • 90KLIKES - Enter this code to get Speed, and Wins Boost.
  • ROCKETROLLERS - Enter this code to get Speed, and Wins Boost.
  • 60KLIKES - Enter this code to get Speed, and Wins Boost.
  • 70KLIKES - Enter this code to get Speed, and Wins Boost.
  • SEASON1 - Enter this code to get Speed and Wins Boost.
  • MXB GAMES - Enter this code to get Speed. Players will be able to enter this code only after joining the MxB Games group.
  • RELEASE - Enter this code to get Speed Boosts.

All Expired Roller Race Simulator Codes

  • 30KLIKES - Enter this code to get 1250 Speed, Wins Boost.
  • 20KLIKES - Enter this code to get 1000 Speed, Wins Boost.
  • HALLOWEEN - Enter this code to get Candy Corn Boost.
  • 10KLIKES - Enter this code to get 750 Speed.
  • 5KLIKES - Enter this code to get Wins Boost and 500 Speed.
  • BALLOON - Enter this code to get Speed Boosts.
  • CARROT - Enter this code to get Wins Boost.
  • PARTY - Enter this code to get Speed Boosts.
  • RACE - Enter this code to get Wins Boost.
  • SUPER - Enter this code to get Wins Boost.

How to Redeem Codes in Roller Race Simulator

The method of redeeming codes in Roblox games rarely varies from game to game. Usually, there is a special button for this, but players who cannot find it can use the instructions below:

  • Open Roblox and launch Roller Race Simulator .
  • There are 4 buttons on the right side of the screen. The Codes button is located to the left of the Setting.
  • In the Enter Code... field, enter or paste the code.
  • Click Submit to get the rewards.

How to Get More Roller Race Simulator Codes

To get the latest information about the game and current codes, players should join the official MxB Games Discord server. Fans can also visit this page searching for new codes, as it is regularly updated.

item.title: Sword of Convallaria Codes (August 2024)
item.description:
Sword of Convallaria is a mobile game that will captivate you from the first seconds of playthrough with its extraordinary story. In addition to the plot, the game also pleases with its high-quality pixel style that looks great even on large screens. As for the gameplay, this is a turn-based strategy where your squad fights opponents with swords, magic, and other things that characters are capable of.

There are a lot of characters, but you can get them through gacha only, so it will take a lot of time. However, you can get plenty of resources and items for free that can improve your characters and help you get new ones. All you have to do is to redeem Sword of Convallaria codes.

All Sword of Convallaria Codes

Working Sword of Convallaria Codes

  • SOCENLAUNCH - Enter this code to get Replete Dining Shelf furniture.
  • SOCTACTICS - Enter this code to get 500 Tarot Essence.
  • SOCFORCE - Enter this code to get 3000 Elysium Coins.
  • SOCTLP - Enter this code to get 500 Radiant Powder.
  • SOCCREATOR - Enter this code to get 500 Tarot Essence.
  • SOCMTASHED - Enter this code to get 500 Star Particles.
  • SOC20KDC - Enter this code to get 150 Hope Luxites.

Expired Sword of Convallaria Codes

There are currently no expired codes for Sword of Convallaria .

How to Redeem Codes in Sword of Convallaria

In mobile games, it's usually not as easy to redeem codes as in Roblox . In Sword of Convallaria , you first need to play for a while before you unlock this option. However, after that, most players will have no problem finding the right button. Nevertheless, some will still need help, so we have created a guide explaining how to redeem codes in Sword of Convallaria .

  • Launch Sword of Convallaria .
  • Play through the tutorial until the full interface appears.
  • Then tap on the button with three dashes in the upper left corner.
  • Next, go to Settings.
  • Open the Account tab.
  • Find the Redeem Code option and press Redeem.
  • In the grey field, paste the code from the working code list and hit Exchange.

If you are not in battle but in the main menu, the instructions are slightly different:

  • Find your profile picture in the upper left corner of the screen. Next to it, tap on the button that looks like a flower with four petals.
  • Next, find the Settings button in the form of a gear in the lower left corner.
  • Next, in the Account tab, press Redeem.
  • Paste the code into the field and hit Exchange.

Remember that codes expire over time, so redeem them immediately.

How to Get More Sword of Convallaria Codes

If you are tired of constantly searching for new working codes, bookmark this page in your browser as we update it on a regular basis, just like other free mobile game codes. In addition, the developers often publish codes on their official social media pages, so keep an eye out for them:

  • Sword of Convallaria Discord server

Sword of Convallaria is available on PC and mobile devices.

item.title: Roblox The Presentation Experience Codes (August 2024)
item.description:
In The Presentation Experience , Roblox players will find themselves in a school and must spend time in class. However, this school offers much more freedom than any real one because players can do whatever they want and no one can punish them for breaking the rules. In this school, students can shout out phrases from popular memes, but they need to pay Points for this. Fortunately, these points can be obtained by entering the codes in this article.

Updated August 5, 2024, by Artur Novichenko: We've thoroughly searched for The Presentation Experience codes, but it seems the developers haven't released any new yet. Keep checking back for future updates.

All The Presentation Experience Codes

Working The Presentation Experience Codes

  • COFFEE - Enter this code to get 60 Points.
  • MAXWELLGOOD - Enter this code to get 20 Gems.
  • MANFACEPOOPER - Enter this code to get 5x Points Boost for 10 minutes
  • HALLWAY - Enter this code to get 10 Gems.
  • UWU - Enter this code to get 20 Gems.
  • THEREARENOOTHERTEACHERSINTHESCHOOLBECAUSENOBODYWANTSTOSEETHEBADTEACHER - Enter this code to get 10 Gems.
  • MINIMALGAMESPRO - Enter this code to get 25 Points.
  • HELICOPTER - Enter this code to get 50 Points.
  • MEGABOOST - Enter this code to get 5x Points Boost for 1 minute.
  • 5GEMS - Enter this code to get 5 Gems.
  • CODE - Enter this code to get 15 Points.
  • RAT - Enter this code to get 25 Points.
  • BOOKWORM - Enter this code to get 80 Points.
  • 10POINTS - Enter this code to get 10 Points.
  • TEACHERMADCUZBAD - Enter this code to get 150 Points.
  • AZUREOPTIX - Enter this code to get 25 Points.
  • TOILET - Enter this code to get 50 Points.
  • POOP - Enter this code to get 100 Points.
  • EMOTIONALDAMAGE - Enter this code to get 80 Points.

All Expired The Presentation Experience Codes

  • FARTYREWARD
  • FUNNYBACKROOMS
  • dodgingcode
  • 400KLIKES
  • scaryhalloween2023
  • spookpoints
  • OMG350KLIKES
  • UGC
  • ITSABOUTDRIVEITSABOUTPOWER
  • nootnoot
  • 200MVISITS !
  • summerboost
  • beatbox
  • bababooeypoints
  • unexpected
  • CHRISTMASGIFT
  • sus
  • MILLIONMEMBERS !
  • 100MVISITS
  • 175klikes
  • 700kmembers
  • 150KLIKES
  • pencil
  • 600kmembers
  • 180klikes
  • Easter

How to Redeem Codes in The Presentation Experience

The buttons in The Presentation Experience interface are quite small, so it is not easy to find the one needed for entering the codes. If players are confused about redeeming the codes, they can use the instructions below:

  • Go to Roblox and launch The Presentation Experience .
  • In the upper-left corner, there are several small round buttons. Click the button with 3 dots to the left of the player's level.
  • After pressing this button, a menu will pop up in which gamers have to press the Codes button. It is blue and has a bird on it, the symbol of Twitter.
  • In the Code field, enter or paste the code and click Redeem.

item.title: Roblox: Hide & Sneak Transform Codes (August 2024)
item.description:
Hide & Sneak Transform is an interesting game in which gamers are divided into 2 teams. During the match, players from both teams can use various advantages, such as transforming into another object in the case of those who are hiding. Unfortunately, this costs currency, which is quite difficult to obtain. To help fans cope with the task, this guide lists all the Hide & Sneak Transform codes. With these codes, users can get not only currency but also a lot of other cool stuff, such as skins or likes boxes.

Updated August 5, 2024, by Artur Novichenko: We are constantly updating this guide to provide you with the most accurate and up-to-date information about Hide & Sneak Transform Wrong codes. Don't forget to bookmark this page and check back regularly for the latest code updates and other useful tips.

All Hide & Sneak Transform Codes

By redeeming codes, gamers can get a lot of cool stuff to gain an advantage in matches or simply change their character's appearance. Fortunately, the developers give really generous rewards for the code redemption, and they also release them often. So, without wasting any time, here are the codes that are currently available.

Codes Checked on August 5, 2024.

Working Hide & Sneak Transform Codes

  • coolskin - Redeem this code to get 1 Skin.
  • veryhappy - Redeem this code to get 500 Coins.
  • betterfuture - Redeem this code to get 500 Coins.
  • supergame - Redeem this code to get 1,000 Coins.
  • happygame - Redeem this code to get 200 Coins.
  • comesoon - Redeem this code to get 1 Likes Box.
  • goodluck - Redeem this code to get 1 Likes Box.
  • mysterygift - Redeem this code to get 1 Likes Box.
  • coolandgift - Redeem this code to get 1 Likes Box.
  • keepitup - Redeem this code to get 1 Likes Box.
  • verynice - Redeem this code to get 1 Skin.

Expired Hide & Sneak Transform Codes

  • updated
  • mysterybox

How to Redeem Codes for Hide & Sneak Transform

After launching the game, players can immediately redeem codes, without any time or level restrictions. This is good because having currency from the start is useful, as it makes it easier for gamers to understand the mechanics and buy some useful items or buffs. You should do the following:

  • Launch Hide & Sneak Transform .
  • Pay attention to the right side of the screen, there are several buttons, including Menu. It's worth noting that sometimes the game interface is transparent, but don't worry because it will eventually load completely.
  • Click on the Menu button to open the drop-down list.
  • In the drop-down list, there will be several buttons, among which players should interact with the first one that says Codes.
  • Now, you can see a new screen with a corresponding interface for entering codes and an Enter button.
  • Now, simply copy one of the above codes, or enter it manually, and then press Enter to get the reward.
